Member Function Documentation

int32_t gaia::text::Collator::compare ( const gaia::base::String &  string1,
const gaia::base::String &  string2 
)

Compares two strings to determine their relative order.

Parameters:
string1the first string to compare.
string2the second string to compare.
Returns:
a negative value if string1 is less than string2, 0 if they are equal and a positive value if string1 is greater than string2.
static Collator* gaia::text::Collator::getInstanceN ( ) [static]

Returns a Collator instance which is appropriate for the user's default Locale.

See also:
gaia::locale::Locale::getDefault()
Remarks:
The returned Collator instance should be deleted manually.
static Collator* gaia::text::Collator::getInstanceN ( const gaia::locale::Locale &  locale) [static]

Returns a Collator instance which is appropriate for locale.

Remarks:
The returned Collator instance should be deleted manually.
